Welcome to my home page.

I’m now an associate professor in School of Physical Science and Technology, Soochow University. I work on active particles, non-equilibrium statistical physics of soft matter, nonlinear dynamics, and systems biology. University page Google Scholar

I would be happy to share some of my research work, notes, ideas, and interesting things on this site.
